sections.name: Immense Mandragora
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Chaotic
traits.text: Chaotic effects often manipulate energy from chaos-aligned Outer Planes and are anathema to lawful divine servants or divine servants of lawful deities. A creature with this trait is chaotic in alignment.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Plant
traits.text: Vegetable creatures have the plant trait. They are distinct from normal plants. Magical effects with this trait manipulate or conjure plants or plant matter in some way. Those that manipulate plants have no effect in an area with no plants.

interaction_abilities.name: Blood Scent
interaction_abilities.text: A mandragora can smell creatures with blood as an imprecise sense at a range of 30 feet, and it can smell demons, fey, and sorcerers with blood as a precise sense at a range of 30 feet.

automatic_abilities.name: Vulnerable to Supernatural Darkness
automatic_abilities.text: Whenever a mandragora begins its turn in an area of magical darkness, it is slowed 1 on that turn.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Reach
traits.text: Natural attacks with this trait can be used to attack creatures up to the listed distance away instead of only adjacent creatures. Weapons with this trait are long and can be used to attack creatures up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent creatures. For creatures that already have reach with the limb or limbs that wield the weapon, the weapon increases their reach by 5 feet.

ability.name: Apocalyptic Shriek

traits.name: Auditory
traits.text: Auditory actions and effects rely on sound. An action with the auditory trait can be successfully performed only if the creature using the action can speak or otherwise produce the required sounds. A spell or effect with the auditory trait has its effect only if the target can hear it. This applies only to sound-based parts of the effect, as determined by the GM. This is different from a sonic effect, which still affects targets who can't hear it (such as deaf targets) as long as the effect itself makes sound.

traits.name: Evocation
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the evocation school of magic, typically involving energy and elemental forces.

traits.name: Mental
traits.text: A mental effect can alter the target's mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.

traits.name: Primal
traits.text: This magic comes from the primal tradition, connecting to the natural world and instinct. Anything with this trait is magical.

ability.effect: The immense mandragora emits a devastating shriek. Each non-mandragora creature within 30 feet must attempt a DC 42 Will save.
ability.success: The creature is sickened 1 and takes 8d8 mental damage.
ability.failure: The creature is sickened 2 and takes 16d8 mental damage.
ability.critical_failure: The creature is sickened 2, slowed 1, and takes 150 mental damage. As long as the creature remains sickened, this slowed condition value can't be reduced below 1.

ability.name: Blood Drain
ability.requirement: The immense mandragora has a creature grabbed
ability.effect: The immense mandragora drains blood from the creature it has grabbed, dealing 12d6 damage. If the creature is a demon, fey, or sorcerer, the mandragora gains temporary Hit Points equal to the damage dealt. A creature that has its blood drained by a mandragora is drained 2 until it receives healing of any kind or amount.

traits.name: Poison
traits.text: An effect with this trait delivers a poison or deals poison damage. An item with this trait is poisonous and might cause an affliction.

stages.name: Stage 2
stages.text: 4d6 poison damage, confused, and stupefied 1 (1 round)

stages.name: Stage 3
stages.text: 6d6 poison damage, confused, and stupefied 1 (1 round)

license.name: OPEN GAME LICENSE Version 1.0a

sections.name: Kingmaker Adventure Path

 **Nereid from the *Tome of Horrors Complete*** © 2011, Necromancer Games Inc. published and distributed by Frog God Games; Author: Scott Greene, based on original material by Gary Gygax.  
 **Quickling from the *Tome of Horrors Complete*** © 2011, Necromancer Games Inc. published and distributed by Frog God Games; Author: Scott Greene, based on original material by Gary Gygax.
